errors.error404-page-not-found: Sorry, the page you're looking for was not found.

errors.unknown-error: Unknown error, please try again later.
errors.password-require: The password requires at least one number, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and 8 characters!

errors.account-confirmation-failed: Error: Your confirmation link has expired or you are using an invalid account!
